title: Co-Design Workshops & Participatory Planning
summary: Facilitate inclusive planning processes that center community voices and local knowledge in development initiatives.
body:
Our co-design workshops bring together diverse stakeholders to collaboratively identify challenges, envision solutions, and develop actionable plans. We use proven participatory methods including community mapping, focus group discussions, stakeholder analysis, and theory of change development.

We ensure marginalized voices—including women, youth, and vulnerable groups—are meaningfully included in decision-making processes.
capabilities: Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA) and Rapid Rural Appraisal (RRA)
Community resource mapping and asset identification
Stakeholder engagement and multi-stakeholder platform facilitation
Theory of change and logical framework development
Gender-responsive and socially inclusive planning methods
